CustomField.description: Tells you whether the Account is Accounting,Consulting,Financial Services,Legal,Professional Services or other industry
CustomField.formula: CASE(Industry, "Legal","Legal", "PS - Accounting","Accounting", "PS - Consulting","Consulting", "PS - Construction","Professional Services - Other", "PS - Engineering","Professional Services - Other", "FS - Banking","Financial Services", "FS - Finance","Financial Services", "FS - Hedge Fund","Financial Services", "FS - Insurance","Financial Services", "FS - Investment Banking","Financial Services", "FS - Private Equity/Venture Capital","Financial Services", "PS - Accounting - Big 4", "Accounting", "PS - Accounting - Global Network", "Accounting", "Other" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tells you whether the Account is Accounting,Consulting,Financial Services,Legal,Professional Services or other industry
CustomField.label: Simple Industry
